DASHBOARD.HEADING: Dashboard
DASHBOARD.WELCOME_MESSAGE: welcome to the latest in your clients' experiences
DASHBOARD.SUMMARY_CLIENT_CHECK_IN_TOOLTIP: How often will an individual client receive a survey from us?
DASHBOARD.SUMMARY_SURVEY_SCHEDULE_TOOLTIP: How often do we send a survey to any clients? Do we send an annual survey to all clients? Do we send a quarterly survey to one quarter of our clients? Or something else?
DASHBOARD.SUMMARY_LEVEL_TOOLTIP: Client experience program level based on progress and years with Client Culture. Levels are bronze, silver, gold and platinum.

DASHBOARD2.HEADING: Dashboard
DASHBOARD2.WELCOME_MESSAGE: welcome to the latest in your clients' experiences
DASHBOARD2.NO_DATA: We do not have any data for the dashboard yet. Once you begin sending surveys and responses are received, the data will be displayed here.
DASHBOARD2.NO_NPS_AVAILABLE: Sorry, we do not have an NPS for you
DASHBOARD2.NO_CLIENT_SCORE_AVAILABLE: Sorry, we do not have a Client Score for you

CLIENT_RESPONSE.HEADING: Feedback
CLIENT_RESPONSE.TOOLTIP_SUB_HEADING: Sort feedback by account value, score and more. Focus on high value promoters for growth opportunities, neutrals for improvement areas and detractors to save at risk relationships.
CLIENT_RESPONSE.TOOLTIP_CLIENT: Shows client and staff with client relationship. Select for client details.
CLIENT_RESPONSE.TOOLTIP_CALL_NOW: Learn more. Click icon to see client details, experience history and call guide.
CLIENT_RESPONSE.TOOLTIP_FLAG: Flag to follow-up later. Item will be added to "Follow-up to do list". Note: scores of 0-6 are flagged by default.
CLIENT_RESPONSE.TOOLTIP_NOTE: Make a note for yourself or other staff working with client. e.g. "John can you call this client please and come back to me."
CLIENT_RESPONSE.TOOLTIP_SENDTHANKS: Send client a quick email – e.g. a thank you for nice feedback or an invitation to meet to discuss improvement suggestions.
CLIENT_RESPONSE.TOOLTIP_KUDOS: Send a kudos message to staff, teams, division or firm.

SURVEY.HEADING: Surveys
SURVEY.ADDITIONAL_QUESTION_HEADING: You may add multiple additional questions to ask survey recipients. Press the button on the left to add a question.
SURVEY.CLIENT_SURVEY_MONTHS_LIMIT: Exclude clients surveyed in past (x) months
SURVEY.SURVEY_HTML_HINT: Enter contents for your survey email. Use placeholders {{CLIENTFIRSTNAME}},{{CLIENTLASTNAME}},{{CLIENTFULLNAME}},{{CLIENTCONTACT}}, {{FIRMNAME}} for dynamic insertion
SURVEY.SURVEY_HTML_STAFF_HINT: Enter contents for your survey email. Use placeholders {{STAFFNAME}}, {{FIRMNAME}} for dynamic insertion
SURVEY.LOYALTY_DRIVER_HEADING: You may add multiple loyalty drivers. Press the button on the left to add an item.
SURVEY.QUEUE_SUCCESS: Survey emails have been successfully queued for sending
SURVEY.QUEUE_CLEAR_SUCCESS: Survey queue cleared and emails sent
SURVEY.QUEUE_CLEAR_NOTIFICATION: Survey queue is being cleared. This process may take sometime. The list will auto refresh once done

SURVEY_EDIT.CLIENT_SURVEY_DESC:
Setup survey for sending to your regular clients. You will need to have a client list setup before sending this survey.

Fully customise the survey to send at regular frequencies and limit by client value and group.
SURVEY_EDIT.PROJECT_SURVEY_DESC:
Send a survey to one off contacts whom you can add by uploading from a CSV file or manually entering them in the survey setup process.

You can also use this option to quickly begin sending surveys using our system and perform analysis on the responses received.
SURVEY_EDIT.PULSE_SURVEY_DESC:
Send a customised questionnaire to your clients. Use this survey to collect feedback on products, services or events.

Note that this survey does not ask for a score from the recipient.
SURVEY_EDIT.STAFF_SURVEY_DESC:
Keep your staff engaged with this survey type. Send an anonymous survey to members of your organisation and gauge areas of improvements based on feedback.

You may limit this survey by Client Contacts and staff department/designation
SURVEY_EDIT.MANAGER_SURVEY_DESC:
Use this survey to receive feedback on managers in your organisation from staff members who report to them. Multiple managers may be added to a survey and staff member may provide individual feedback.

Manager surveys are anonymous like ,the staff surveys
SURVEY_EDIT.EMAIL_CONTENT_ERROR: Email content must be between 20 to 500 characters
SURVEY_EDIT.EMAIL_CONTENTS_PLACEHOLDER: Enter contents for the email message here...
SURVEY_EDIT.EMAIL_CONTENT_CLIENT:
Dear {{CLIENTNAME}}

{{CLIENTCONTACT}} would like to ask one question.

How likely are you to recommend {{FIRMNAME}} to a friend or colleague?

Please choose a number below.
SURVEY_EDIT.REMINDER_CONTENT_CLIENT:
Dear {{CLIENTNAME}}

We'd really appreciate if you could take a moment to answer a simple question.

How likely are you to recommend us to a friend or colleague?

Please choose a number below.
SURVEY_EDIT.EMAIL_CONTENT_PROJECT:
Dear {{CLIENTNAME}}

We would like to ask one question.

How likely are you to recommend {{FIRMNAME}} to a friend or colleague?

Please choose a number below.
SURVEY_EDIT.REMINDER_CONTENT_PROJECT:
Dear {{CLIENTNAME}}

We'd really appreciate if you could take a moment to answer a simple question.

How likely are you to recommend us to a friend or colleague?

Please choose a number below.
SURVEY_EDIT.EMAIL_CONTENT_PULSE:

To help us continue to improve our services, please click the button below to complete a short question survey.
SURVEY_EDIT.REMINDER_CONTENT_PULSE:
Dear {{CLIENTNAME}}

To help us continue to improve our services, please click the button below to complete a short question survey.
SURVEY_EDIT.EMAIL_CONTENT_STAFF:

We would like to ask one question.

How likely are you to recommend {{FIRMNAME}} to a friend or colleague?

Please choose a number below.
SURVEY_EDIT.REMINDER_CONTENT_STAFF:
Dear {{STAFFNAME}}

We would like to ask one question.

How likely are you to recommend {{FIRMNAME}} to a friend or colleague?

Please choose a number below.

SURVEY_EDIT.REMINDER_CONTENT_MANAGER: To help us continue to improve your work environment please click on the button below to complete a short question survey about your manager or managers.

SETTING.HEADING: Modify application settings
SETTING.TESTIMONIAL_PERMISSION_FIRST_NAME: First name (plus first letter of surname)
